title: How to bridge the gap to Pogačar and Vingegaard in a Tour de France with ‘two aliens’
content:
Tadej Pogačar and Jonas Vingegaard are riding away from the pack in this Tour – here's how their rivals plan to catch back.

Read the full article at How to bridge the gap to Pogačar and Vingegaard in a Tour de France with ‘two aliens’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
